game.name: Wicked Seed
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 생존 호러와 턴제 액션 RPG가 결합된 이 게임에서 무시무시한 위협과 싸우세요. 장비를 커스터마이즈하고 업그레이드하며, 퍼즐을 풀고 몬스터와 맞서 싸우면서 진실을 밝혀내세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A modern-day horror RPG with tactical combat and survival horror roots. Customize your loadout, manage limited resources, and exploit enemy weaknesses in tense, strategic encounters.
